title: User-Reported Phishing Triage
description: A SOC analyst receives an email reported by a user as suspicious and must determine if it is malicious.

tasks.description: Analyze the headers of the reported email to check for signs of spoofing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst identifies that the email's 'From' address is forged.

tasks.description: Detonate the email's attachment in a sandbox environment to observe its behavior.
tasks.expected_outcome: The sandbox analysis shows the attachment attempts to download and execute malware.

tasks.description: Confirm the email is malicious and initiate a search for other users who may have received the same email.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst validates the threat and begins scoping the extent of the campaign.
